Primary Contact: Christina MacMaster, Community Programs & Services Coordinator
Service Details: - Provides special outings for participants- Excursions are often a surprise, and participants often don’t know in advance where they are going or what they are going to attend- Past outings have included taking in a live play in Kelowna, dinner and a movie in West Kelowna, or shopping and lunch in Summerland
How to Apply: Please call or email for additional information
